summary.span: 取得 執行個體的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of instances .
A collection of correlation queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以訊息抵達端點時執行的查詢填入這個集合，進而判定應將訊息傳送至哪一個工作流程執行個體。Populate this collection with queries that are run when a message arrives on the endpoint to determine which workflow instance the message should be sent to. 如果自訂執行個體解析是透過覆寫 提供的，就不需使用這個屬性。This property does not need to be used if custom instance resolution is provided by overriding .
